title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta in a large pan until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk eggs and grated cheeses together with plenty of black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving some cooking water, and immediately add to the pancetta.
Remove from heat and quickly stir in the egg mixture, creating a creamy sauce.
Add pasta water as needed to loosen the sauce.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Cut chicken into chunks and marinate in yogurt and 1 tbsp masala paste for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until lightly charred.
In a separate pan, fry chopped onion and garlic until soft.
Add remaining paste and cook for 1 minute.
Add tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Blend sauce until smooth, return to pan.
Add chicken and cream, simmer for 5 minutes.
Garnish with coriander and serve with rice.
